Nim TestKit Automated Test Runner

Runs all generated tests with support for various output formats

Imports

config, jujutsu_test_integration

Types

TestResult = object
  name*: string
  file*: string
  passed*: bool
  duration*: float
  output*: string
TestSuite = object
  name*: string
  results*: seq[TestResult]
  totalDuration*: float

    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
